entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Hazy this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
